message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
Hi Bob, I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $110 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $95.
Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to compromise again. I can offer it to you for $105.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $98. I'm really interested in this product, but I need to make sure I'm getting the best deal possible.
Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer it to you for $102.

I really appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I think we're getting close to the sweet spot. I'm willing to meet you at $100, which is the price I'm willing to pay for this product. Can you meet me there?
